horizontal.desc: Make virtual list work in horizontal mode

options.desc: Available options that the user can select from

virtualListSliceSize.desc: Number of options to render in the virtual list

virtualListItemDefaultSize.desc: Default size of an option (height or width for horizontal mode), in px - will be used for rendering the initial list. Try to use a value close to the minimum size of an item.

virtualListMaxPadding.desc: Maximum accepted height for one padding element
